content.prompt: Write a function (static method) that takes an array of intsand an int named x as parameters, and returnsthe number of values in the array that are divisible by x.For example:countDivisibleByX( {1,2,3,4,5,6}, 2) => 3countDivisibleByX( {1,2,3,4,5,6}, 1) => 6countDivisibleByX( {1,2,3,4,5,6}, 7) => 0
